# ZudoMart & My Services

## Overview
I provide digital solutions and consulting for entrepreneurs, creators, and small businesses, helping them leverage technology to grow, monetize, and operate safely online. One of my key projects is **ZudoMart**, an African-first superapp that empowers users to trade safely, showcase their skills, and connect with trusted communities.

## ZudoMart Highlights
- **Marketplace & Micro-gigs**: Buy, sell, and offer services securely.
- **Escrow Payments**: Ensures safe transactions between users.
- **AI Fraud Detection**: Six-tier verification to reduce scams.
- **Hyperlocal Discovery**: Find products, services, and creators nearby.
- **Live Stream Commerce**: Sell products live with virtual gifts.
- **ZudoReels**: Short-form product videos to showcase offerings.
- **Localized Payment Options**: Supports regional payment methods.
- **Creator Monetization Tools**: Built-in features for earning online.

## Audience
African entrepreneurs, creators, and micro-sellers seeking safe, local, and scalable commerce solutions.

## My Services
- Software Engineer 
- Cybersecurity consulting and secure web design
- AI-driven project development
- Virtual assistance and productivity optimization
- Technical guidance for startups and marketplaces
